summary: Since my FoV setting constantly kept reverting back to the original value, I made this tiny plugin to keep it fixed at the specified value.
descriptionHtml:
Since my FoV setting constantly kept reverting back to the original value, I made this tiny plugin to keep it fixed at the specified value. Try it out if you experience similar problems.

INSTALLATION:

Just get Script Dragon here and install it: 

Forum: http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1303320-rel-script-dragon/
Direct Link: http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/Files/tes/ScriptDragon_1.3.7.0.zip

After that just copy the FoV.asi and fov.ini into your Skyrim folder.
The FoV value is specified in the fov.ini and defaults to 90.
author: zenofx
